title: Israeli soldiers shot a Palestinian boy and stood around as he bled to death, video shows
summary_full: Israeli forces blocked Palestinian ambulances while a 14-year-old lay bleeding for at least 45 minutes.
summary_public: Israeli forces blocked Palestinian ambulances while a 14-year-old lay bleeding for at least 45 minutes.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: Israeli soldiers shot a Palestinian boy and stood around as he bled to death
